text: Monica Lee Gradischek (born 15 December 1971 in Jeannette, Pennsylvania) is an American actress and voice actress. She graduated from New York University (NYU) on 1994. Gradischek has work in animation, commercials, and video games as well as performing arts. She starred in the Lifetime Television reality series "Off The Leash" in October 2006. She also played the role of Darlene in the Cartoon Network series Squirrel Boy. ==Other websites== * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:actors from Pennsylvania Category:American voice actors
title: Monica Lee Gradischek
